A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Beautiful scenes that left me thrilled sometimes. But in general several plot twists without any explanation\, plot holes that severely contradict what had already been established by the rest of the saga. Overall the movie turns out to be strong at some points\, but has a weak narrative in general. Leaving disappointed whoever expected the story to be unleash by it\, making it unpredictable precisely by ignoring (on several levels) things that all seven other films had already established.
